name: Zeldo The Legendo
description:
Zeldo The Legendo is a top-down action game where you have to fight the Wise Mystical Tree as Evil Zeldo.

Your mission is to defeat the Wise Mystical Tree with your Legendary Sword and mind-blowing fight skills to complete your awesome journey!

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2023 (Caracas Game Jam)

Play on fullscreen for a better experience.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space to attack

Team:

  • Juan Oropeza (designer and game programmer)
  • Carlos Rivero (designer and game programmer)
  • Jose Barrera (designer)
  • Sandra Vera (game programmer and artist)
  • Arturo Riera (music composer)

Special thanks to Manuel Escalante and Amin Arriaga.

Credits:

Art:

Ui icons by Robert Brooks - gamedeveloperstudio.com

Casual Game Buttons Vol. 02 by Viktor Gogela

Humble Fonts by somepx
